# Play Random Video from Folder [(by VRFlad)](https://www.twitch.tv/VRFlad)

## Description
Play a random video from a folder using Streamer.bot.

## Installation
Copy the import code below and paste into the `Import Pane`:
```text

```
![random-video-from-folder-import.png](/extensions/play-random-video-from-folder/images/random-video-from-folder-import.png)

## Configuration
Change the `Set Argument` `Value` for `%randomVideoFolder%` to the folder you want to use. ![random-video-from-folder-folder.png](/extensions/play-random-video-from-folder/images/random-video-from-folder-folder.png)
> Make sure you use ``\\` instead of``&#96; in the file path. 
> 
> {.is-warning}

Change the `Set Argument` `Value` for `%randomVideoSource%` to the name of the `Image Source` in OBS. ![random-video-from-folder-source.png](/extensions/play-random-video-from-folder/images/random-video-from-folder-source.png)
